ParameterFields.Name: Extra Scale
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
Amount to add to this cannon's scale, in increments of 10%.
For example, setting this to 5 would make the cannon 1.5 times larger than normal.
0 and 255 both do not add any extra scale.

ParameterFields.Name: Visible Area Path
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This cannon will only be able to see Link when he is inside the area of this path.
